resources:
BusanPartners
Student Authentication Process For smooth service delivery, a simple authentication process is required. 
 Verification of your university email is required.
Student ID Authentication Process Please submit a photo of your student ID showing your name.
Upon completion of authentication Authenticated students can chat freely without any restrictions. 
 Make new connections and valuable experiences.
By continuing on this application, you agree to our Terms of Use and Privacy Policy.
Traveler Authentication Process For a smooth service delivery, we require a simple authentication process.
Please capture or take a photo with your name on it. Please attach at least two photos, including your flight ticket and proof of accommodation.
Skip Next
Welcome to BusanPartners! We provide opportunities for cultural exchange by connecting foreign tourists visiting Busan with local university students.
Share a message with your counterpart. Complete the authentication and start chatting with your desired partner.
Experience a cultural exchange. Interact with different people and expand your horizons.
Experience cultural exchange. Share Location Share the location Details Who are you? Please select Student or Traveler. Student Interact with different people and broaden your horizons. Traveler Experience special moments in the daily life of Busan. Enter your email 1. Email Authentication • Enter the email of the university you are currently attending, and enter the verification number you received in the email. Email Send Authentication Email Attach Image 2. Student ID • Upload a photo that shows your name and student ID number. Select Image Send Enter Authentication Number The authentication number has been sent. Please enter your authentication number. Confirm Authentication Number Verified Next Frequently Asked Questions Location Festival Period Homepage Check Location Current Festival Nearby attractions Meet precious connections in Busan 
Start now! Google Login By proceeding, you agree to our Terms of Service and Privacy Policy. Authentication Authenticate Notifications All Notifications Chat Notifications Settings Log Out App languages Frequently Asked Questions Terms of Service Privacy Policy Delete Account Foreign Tourist Authentication Guide 1. Airplane ticket or Ship ticket • Please capture or photograph and upload so we can verify your name and date. • Other personal details can be masked. • Provide proof of your stay at a property booked on a website or app such as Agoda, Expedia, Trip.com, etc. • Your name and dates should be clearly visible. Other personal details can be masked. 2. Proof of Accommodation It is most important that the names and dates match. 
Please upload at least one photo each. \Uploaded photos will be deleted 7 days after verification Student List Contact This has been automatically translated using the DeepL service. 
Some translations may not be accurate. It was nice to meet you. Please tell us why you want to delete your account. 
Your feedback will help us improve our service. I am not comfortable with the service. I am concerned about the security of my personal information. I am dissatisfied with the matching system. I have experienced inconvenience from the other person. It is too complicated to use. Other (enter your own) Delete Profile Screen Create keywords that represent you. Add a tag You can be contacted by travelers. Name Major (optional) Write a brief introduction about yourself. Save Your profile will be automatically translated for the other party using DeepL. 
 Save will start the translation. Please be patient. You can edit your basic image or name. 
 This feature will be expanded once you complete university student verification. View Profile Chat Message Receive notifications when messages come in. If you change the importance level, you may not receive the notifications set by BusanPartners normally. Please allow location notifications.
The total number of students available to contact in Busan is %1$d. Please complete authentication first. Current number of students you can contact: %1$d
Students cannot contact other students. You cannot contact someone with whom you are currently chatting or have already finished chatting. The maximum number of chat rooms you can have active is three.
Thank you for using our service. We hope you had a great experience in Busan. Please come back again! Confirm Your authentication is complete. Contact the students first. Make precious memories with a variety of people! Press back one more time to exit. Location Permission Needed Location permission is required to use this feature. Error Available until yyyy-MM-dd.
An error occurred while fetching the token. Please log in again. Network Error No internet connection. The app will close. Retrying to connect: %1$d Maximum retries reached. Please log in again. Guest user connection failed: %1$s User connection failed: %1$s An error occurred while setting up the user stream.
The other party left the chat room and cannot send a message.
The other party has left the chat room. Leaving the chat room Are you sure you want to leave the chat room? You will not be able to chat with the other party again. Cancel Mute chat room notifications Unmute chat room notifications Leaving the chat room
Data has changed from the server. Please try again.
Email verification completed successfully. Please prepare a photo of your student ID. Email verification failed. Please check and try the verification code again. You cannot go back during the verification process.
Please enter an email. Please enter a valid email address (%1$s). Sending verification code Please wait a moment.
Saved successfully. Please add a photo of your student ID! Alert You can't change it after you save it.
Are you sure you want to save it? Choose a photo You cannot go back during the verification process.
Loading Verifying the authentication number.
All Others
Notification is activated Notification deactivated Are you sure you want to log out? Authorization is in progress. Please wait a moment. Authentication is already completed. Welcome to Busan. 
 Feel free to chat until %1$s. Your authentication has been completed. \Make precious memories with a variety of people!
Please add a photo to verify your identity! Please add at least two photos!
All of your information will be deleted immediately and cannot be restored. Please choose the reason for deletion Deleting account Please wait for a moment. This may take up to 20 seconds Your account has been successfully deleted. You are returning to the main screen. Account deletion failed. Reauthentication failed. Please try again. Google login failed. Please try again.
Please enter your name! Your changes have not been saved.
Are you sure you want to leave?
You have a new message from the other party! Tap the notification to check it out. New Messages Multiple messages received.
System default language (recommended)
Privacy Policy Last updated: July 10, 2024 BusanPartners ("our app") takes your privacy seriously and is committed to protecting your personal information in accordance with privacy laws and complying with applicable laws and regulations. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, store and protect your personal information. 1. What personal information we collect Our app collects the following personal information:

Required information: name, email address, profile picture (collected when you sign in with Google)
Additional information (for university student verification:) University email, student ID photo
Additional information (for tourist verification)
Additional information (for tourist verification): Airplane/boat ticket, accommodation certificate (only the part that identifies your name and date)
Location information: Used to recommend nearby tourist attractions 2. How we collect personal information Automatically collected via Google Sign-in and Firebase authentication
Direct user input and file uploads
Location information is collected automatically only if you have allowed location permissions 3. Purpose of using personal information Create and manage accounts
Provide and improve services
Authenticate university students and tourists
Provide personalized services and promotional information
Recommend nearby attractions 4. Sharing and Providing Personal Information In principle, we do not provide your personal information to outside parties, except in the following cases:

With your consent
In accordance with the provisions of the law
At the request of an investigative agency 5. Period of Retention and Use of Personal Information We will destroy personal information without delay after the purpose of collecting and using it has been fulfilled. If we are required to keep it by law, we will keep it for the period stipulated by the law. 6. Procedures and methods for destroying personal information Destruction procedure: After achieving the purpose of collection and use, it is transferred to a separate DB and stored for a certain period before being destroyed
Destruction method: Electronic files are destroyed by technical methods so that they cannot be recovered, and paper documents are destroyed by shredding or incineration 7. Your rights and how to exercise them You may exercise your rights to access, correct, delete, or suspend processing of your personal data at any time. To do so, please contact appbusanpartners@gmail.com으로 and we will do so without delay. 8. Measures to ensure the safety of personal information Encryption of personal information
Technical measures against hacking
Access control and education 9. Collection and use of location information Our app collects your location information for the purpose of recommending nearby attractions. If you deny location permissions, the app may request additional location permissions. Location information is not collected in real time and is only used with your consent. 10. Privacy Officer and Contact Information Privacy Officer: Minseok Kwon
Contact: 010-4748-7731
Email: appbusanpartners@gmail.com 11. Changes to the Privacy Policy This Privacy Policy is subject to change by law and internal policy. Changes will be announced on this page, and any material changes will be announced separately.
Terms of Service Last updated: July 10, 2024 Welcome! Thank you for using BusanPartners (hereinafter referred to as 'our app'). These Terms of Service describe the conditions and guidelines for use of our App, and you must comply with them. 1. Introduction BusanPartners is a service that connects university students in Busan with foreign tourists. Users can also communicate with each other through the chat function. 2. Sign up Users sign up through Google Sign-in, which collects their name, email, and profile picture. If you are a university student, you will need to submit your university email verification and student ID photo. If you are a tourist, you will need to submit your airplane/boat ticket and proof of accommodation. 3. Use of Location Information Our app collects your location information to provide you with services to introduce you to nearby tourist attractions. Location information is only collected with your consent, and you can stop providing your location information at any time. If location information is disabled, the feature will not be available. Location information is protected in accordance with our Privacy Policy. 4. Privacy Our app is committed to protecting your privacy, which is handled in accordance with our Privacy Policy. 5. Account Responsibilities You must keep your account information confidential and not share it with anyone else. You are responsible for all activity on your account." . 6. Prohibited Conduct You may not:

Use unlawful activities
Infringe on the rights of others
Provide false information
Attempt to disrupt services or hack into systems
Transmit or share inappropriate content 7. Service Interruptions and Changes Our App may temporarily or permanently discontinue or change the Service as needed. If this happens, we will give you advance notice and endeavor to ensure that you are not disadvantaged. 8. Limitation of Liability Our app is not responsible for disputes between users. We are not liable for any damages arising from the use of the service. 9. Changes to the Terms of Service These Terms are subject to change due to changes in law or the policies of the Service. We will notify you of material changes via a notice. 10. Contact Us For questions about the Terms of Service, please contact appbusanpartners@gmail.com.
App Languages Select your language.
